title: Serial Confessor /// Part 2 /// 414
description:
Serial Confessor /// Part 2 /// 414

Part 2 of 2


www.TrueCrimeGarage.com

This week in the Garage… There is a murder of a young woman in Montana and the case goes cold. Then we have three killed in Louisiana. Police announce that the three murders are connected and then they get a confession to all four. Join us for a cold one and some cold case discussion that you will not forget.
Beer of the Week - Imperial Confession by 1940’s Brewing CompanyGarage Grade - 4 out of 5 Bottle Caps

Help fund a cold case investigation and watch great True Crime Documentaries all for FREE! Sign up at https://www.magellantv.com/cold-case Thank you for your help!

Check out these great sponsors of TCG!Find all of the great products from Pink at www.Target.com and CVSwww.Fitbod.me/GARAGE - Try FitBod for FREE for one month when you sign up today!
